--- title: "SM-Explorer" --- ::: {.callout-note collapse='false' title='Caution'} The SM-Explorer is a work in progress. There are a small heap of bugs I'm already aware of, and about a hundred things I'd still like to add. If/when you find things that aren't working properly, please feel free to let Chris know! ::: This is a Shiny app that allows for interactive exploration of metrics, mostly at the county level. It includes a map page, a bivariate plot explorer, and a metadata table much like what is included in this Quarto doc. It tends to work best if you open it in its own page using the button below: ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: You can also just use it here in the window. Note that some functions (like the full screen button) won't work here.
